comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Color resolution is 300x300dpi (color was not tested).

Manual change between color and B/W cartdriges.

See also the HP DeskJet 400 entry for various driver options.

This printer seems to have a 600x300-dpi-REt grayscale mode which is probably not accessable with free software.

Consumables/Refills: Ink cartridges B/W:HP51626A/HP51626G Color:HP51625A
